ext_use_long: The external usage API is useful for applications such as ShareX or similar software
file_provided_is_invalid: Sorry, your image file is invalid!
file_provided_is_valid: Well, your image file is valid!
how_to_use_ext_api: How to use the external API (Instructions for: ShareX | Currently only links, no pictures)?
how_to_use_ext_api_explain_step1:
Open your ShareX,
right click on targets ,
drag the mouse on URL Shortener ,
select Own URL Shortener in the selection list
how_to_use_ext_api_explain_step2:
Click again on Destinations ,
click on Custom Uploader Settings ... ,
click on new Uploader,
name it in whatever you want and click on Destination Type : URL shortener ,
set the method to POST ,
and copy % url% < / code> in your URL field,
In the Body field, create a parameter with the name: "target" and with the value: "$ input $ "
how_to_use_ext_api_explain_step3:
When you are finished with step 2, go to the Response Tab and select under Parse Response: "JSON".
Now you simply copy the following code $ json: url $ into your URL field and your own URL shortener should be ready to use!
how_to_use_ext_api_explain_title1: Step 1: Use your own URL shorter
how_to_use_ext_api_explain_title2: Step 2: set up your own URL shorter (request)
how_to_use_ext_api_explain_title3: Step 3: set up your own URL shorter (answer)

register_successful_long: You have registered successfully! You can now register.
shortlink_created_long: Your shortened link has been created!
shortlink_deleted: The shortened link has been deleted
shortlink_is_forgiven: Sorry, this shortened link is taken
wrong_filetype: Wrong file type! Allowed: JPG, PNG, GIF

manage_account_long: Manage your account. Change your password, email and other information
change_password_long: Change your password if you want to have a new one
password_changed_long: Your password has been changed. Please log in again. You will be redirected in 3 seconds. If not, click here
token_from_email_long: The token was sent to the specified email address.
no_email_received: I have not received an email.
reset_password_email_content:
A password reset procedure has been initiated through our website. To verify yourself, enter the following code on the website: %token%

If you were not, you can ignore this email. The originator will not be able to access your account without the code.
invalid_reset_token: Your reset code is invalid! Please try again.
new_password_sent: We have just emailed you a new password. Sign in here with him. As soon as you have registered, you can set a new, freely chosen password in the dashboard at the bottom under "Manage account".
email_welcome_content:
Welcome!

Welcome to DHRE, %username%!

Your new password is: "% password% ".
You can change it in the dashboard under" Manage Account "=>" Change Password "

Log in here
manage_startpage_long: Manage and personalize your own homepage
startpage_title_long: Change the title of your homepage. This is shown on your homepage in large in the middle of the screen
video_in_queue_long: Your video is now in the queue and will be available soon.
video_convert_info: For performance reasons, videos are only converted every 10 minutes.
video_convert_betainfo: This is a beta, which can lead to errors. In addition, the quota limit is not yet limited.
